select t.id, t.user_id, u.nickname, u.avatar, t.name, t.category, t.downloads, t.create_time from sys_resource t left join sys_user u on t.user_id = u.id where t.status = 2
and t.category = #{sysResource.category}
and t.name like concat('%',#{sysResource.name},'%')
order by t.downloads desc ,t.create_time desc
